topic: Cinematic Primitivism Glyph Icon Sheet Art
style: Contemporary Tribal Art, Minimalist Vector Illustration, Screen Print Aesthetic, Limited Color Palette
use_case: Digital sticker packs, apparel design motifs, abstract brand iconography, poster art prints.
template: A full sheet view of a [SCENE] featuring highly stylized, abstract icons of [SUBJECT]. Each icon uses solid black fill and thick outlines, rendered in a contemporary tribal primitivism style, reminiscent of ancient glyphs. Details utilize a strict limited color palette: black, desaturated cream background, and a single accent color: [COLOR]. [MOOD] atmosphere. Minimalist vector illustration, high negative space, no shading, subtle screen print texture, studio light. --ar 2:3

variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: Defines the thematic content of the icons (e.g., 'Desert Flora,' 'Celestial Bodies,' 'Medieval Armor').
variable_explanations.[MOOD]: Sets the overall feeling or thematic tone (e.g., 'Ancient,' 'Playful,' 'Gothic').
variable_explanations.[COLOR]: Specifies the single dominant accent color used alongside black (e.g., 'Rust Red,' 'Teal Blue,' 'Mustard Yellow').
variable_explanations.[SCENE]: Controls the composition and quantity of the icons on the sheet (e.g., '30 piece grid collection,' 'Alphabet illustration sheet,' '4x4 icon set').

tips: Use strong, high-contrast colors for [COLOR] to ensure the accent stands out against the black and cream.
The [SCENE] variable is crucial for maintaining the grid/collection composition of the original image.
Focus on single, simple objects for [SUBJECT] to encourage the abstract 'icon' rendering.
description: A high-contrast, graphic style template designed to generate collections of abstract, glyph-like icons rooted in contemporary primitivism. It guarantees a highly consistent, two-tone, flat vector aesthetic ideal for striking visual branding.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

suggestions: Consider: cozy, vintage, surreal, elegant, vibrant
Add: scene, cover, portrait, landscape, texture

feedback.title_quality: The title 'Modern Product Photography' partially meets the criteria. It successfully includes a strong descriptor ('Modern') and adheres to the length constraint (3 words). However, it fails to explicitly state the output type in the title itself. While 'Photography' implies an image, 'Prompt' or 'Image Generator' is necessary for marketplace clarity to avoid ambiguity regarding a guide versus a generative tool. This impacts the final score significantly.
feedback.template_structure: The template structure is excellent and fully compliant with all criteria. The subject variable `[product_name]` is clearly marked. The core style descriptors ('Clean background, minimalist aesthetic, soft studio lighting, high-resolution, professional-grade') are detailed and robust, making up roughly 40% of the prompt content. Technical specifications (aspect ratio, model version, style parameters) are complete and appropriate for a high-quality image generation prompt. The style descriptors are perfectly aligned with the 'Modern Product Photography' title promise.
feedback.variable_examples: The provided examples are high quality and demonstrate excellent range. The mix of specific items ('Vintage leather briefcase', 'Smartwatch on a stand') and categorical examples ('Footwear', 'Home decor items') ensures broad applicability. The diversity in product types (electronics, food/beverage, apparel) clearly demonstrates the prompt's versatility. This section fully meets all requirements.
feedback.commercial_viability: The commercial viability assessment is strong. The use cases (e-commerce, social media marketing) are clearly defined and highly relevant to the target audience. The suggested premium price tier is appropriate for a prompt that generates business assets. The unique value proposition of creating studio-quality images without expensive equipment is compelling and effectively differentiates the product.
feedback.description_quality: The prompt description is well-written and effective. It features a compelling hook aimed at the target audience ('Tired of generic stock photos?'). The technical features are clearly listed, and the specified use cases reinforce the commercial value. The overall quality is professional and persuasive.

priority_improvements: Refine the title to explicitly include the output type. A title such as 'Modern E-commerce Photography Prompt' or 'Minimalist Product Image Generator' would be more accurate and perform better in search results.

test_instructions: Fill in each variable with different values to test versatility.
Try using the first example prompt exactly as written as your baseline.
Test at least 3-5 different variations to ensure consistent style.
Experiment with Midjourney parameters like `--ar` or `--stylize`.
quality_checklist: Style Consistency: Does the style remain consistent?
Composition: Does the output match your compositional expectations?
Visual Quality: Is the output high-quality?
Variable Impact: Does changing variables produce meaningful differences?

commercial_description:
Generate an entire, perfectly cohesive sheet of museum-quality Primitivism Glyphs in seconds, transforming abstract ideas into powerful, ancient iconography.

*   **Guaranteed Visual Harmony:** Achieve instant consistency across dozens of elements, ensuring every glyph looks like it belongs to the same lost civilization's codex.
*   **Zero-Fuss Styling:** Forget complex parameters; the perfect ancient texture, deep relief, and professional lighting are meticulously built into the template. No technical expertise required.
*   **The Archeologist's Toolkit:** Effortlessly adapt the style to render anything—from modern tech concepts to mythical creatures—with stunning primal authenticity.

Perfect for creating distinctive branding assets, unique video game UI elements, striking tattoo designs, or high-concept editorial illustrations.

Stop wrestling with complicated syntax. This template is your shortcut to professional-grade results—simply input your subject and witness the magic unfold.
enhancement_log: Title fixed: Primitivism Glyph Icon Sheet -> Cinematic Primitivism Glyph Icon Sheet Art
